33.Name: Merciless Looting
33.Ability: During end; Gain 1 gold for every enemy destroyed and 2 gold for every enemy defeated during this turn

34.Name: Shipyard
34.Ability:
All Allied ships gain 2 Health
1PT INVESTIGATE Equip 3; Add a 'Ship'

35.Name: Shipwreck
35.Ability: Destroy all allied units (min 1); Deal instances of 2 damage per 'Ship' destroyed to all enemy units, or face if there are no enemy units, then deal instances of 1 damage for each other ally destroyed, then deploy a 'Ferry of The Damned' from your deck

36.Name: Treasure Map
36.Ability:
Target enemy zone in column with no allied units; During end mark that zone
If life is damaged through marked zone; Gain 3 gold

37.Name: Hunting Season
37.Ability: All allied 'animals' gain HASTE and 1 power + 1 additional power for each 'druid' unit you control

38.Name: Animal Training
38.Ability:
If an 'Animal' and 'Druid' support each other; The 'Animal' gains 2 Health and the 'Druid' gains 1 Power
SLOW, 1PT; INVESTIGATE unit 1; add 1 'Animal'

39.Name: Calling Howl
39.Ability: If you control a 'Dog', at the start of your next turn; Deploy 2 'Dog' units from your deck

40.Name: Return of the dead
40.Ability: 1PT, target an 'Undead' unit in your graveyard and pay its cost; deploy it from your graveyard

41.Name: Forced Entombment
41.Ability: SEARCH Unit; Send a unit to grave

42.Name: Ghoulification
42.Ability: Sacrifice a unit, target a unit in the grave, Cost is equal to grave unit cost - sacrificed unit cost; Deploy the unit from grave additionally as 'Undead'

43.Name: Voodoo Ritual
43.Ability: Target enemy unit, target allied unit; deal an amount of damage equal to the allied units current health to both units

44.Name: Oath to Being
44.Ability: Target unit in grave, the cost of this card is equal to the cost of the unit +1 (if the target is a 'Cultist' the cost is the cost of the unit); deploy it with +1 Power

45.Name: Oath to Knowledge
45.Ability:
This card has cost 0 if there are no Oath card in your grave 
Search one 'Oath' spell (you can only cast 1 'Oath Of Mystery' per turn)

46.Name: Oath to Mimicry
46.Ability: Target one General 'Oath' spell in your graveyard; The ability of this card becomes the ability of the targeted card

47.Name: Oath to Destruction
47.Ability: Target unit or player; deal it damage equal to half the number of 'Oath' spells (rounded up) in the grave +2 (Max 5 damage)

48.Name: Oath to Banishment
48.Ability: Target unit, equip or permament; Place 'Oath' cards in the grave equal to its cost then destroy it

49.Name: Oath to Strength
49.Ability: Target unit; it gains 2 power If that unit deals face damage gain 1 gold if there is at least 2 Oath cards in your grave and 2 gold if there are at least 4

50.Name: Oath to Silence
50.Ability: Target unit; SILENCE it and any equipment attatched to it until the end of next turn

51.Name: Disruption
51.Ability: When a spell is cast, X = the casted spell's cost; Counter it

52.Name: Piercing Arrow
52.Ability: Target column; Deal 4 damage to all enemy units in that column

54.Name: Eruption
54.Ability: Destroy all units with 4 or less Health

55.Name: Intervention
55.Ability: Cast when a unit would take damage; reduce that damage to 0

57.Name: Shatter
57.Ability: Target permament spell or an equipment; Destroy it
